Hello hearts, ❤

Are you ready to code, crunch, and create? Join Today at 2pm via Microsoft Teams 😊

Please check the attachment to find your team since we have shuffled some teams.

Event Details:

  *   Date: 8th November 2023
  *   Time: 2 pm

body.content:
Hello hearts, ❤

 

Are you ready to code, crunch, and create? Join Today at 2pm via Microsoft Teams 😊

 

Please check the attachment to find your team since we have shuffled some teams.

 

Event Details:

  • Date: 8th November 2023
  • Time: 2 pm - 6 pm
  • Online Via Microsoft Teams

Feel the adrenaline, unleash your creativity, and be part of the future at Code Crunch! 🌐🚀

See you at Code Crunch, where the code is our canvas, and AI is our masterpiece!

 

Best Regards,

value.subject: Bistec Newsletter - October 2023
value.bodyPreview:
CAUTION: This email was sent from outside of BISTEC Global. Please do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender.

Celebrating Our Team: Hearts Spotlight and Company Updates
BISTEC certified as one of the Best Workplaces in Asi

body.content:
CAUTION: This email was sent from outside of BISTEC Global. Please do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender.

Celebrating Our Team: Hearts Spotlight and Company Updates

BISTEC certified as one of the Best Workplaces in Asia!


The Hearts have spoken, and we've got some fantastic news to share! BISTEC Global has officially earned its place among the Best Places to Work, not only in Sri Lanka but across the entire Asian region. We're thrilled to announce that we've been ranked 30th in the Small and Medium Workplaces category in Asia!

But the good news doesn't stop there. We have been certified as a Great Place to Work for the second year in a row with a score above 95% in all statements.

But wait, there's more! In our very first year, BISTEC has not only made waves regionally but also locally. We've secured our spot in not one, not two, but THREE other top Great Places to Work lists right here in Sri Lanka:

1. Best Workplaces™ in the IT/ITES Industry in Sri Lanka

2. Best Workplaces™ in Sri Lanka for Women

3. Best Workplaces™ in Sri Lanka for Millennials

We would like to take this opportunity to sincerely thank each and every employee for their hard work and contributions. This is a remarkable milestone, and it would not have been possible without the dedication and passion of the BISTEC Hearts, We can't wait to celebrate this incredible journey with you!

New Projects

CRS Web foundation Project

CSR is a leading building products company in Australia and New Zealand and is the name behind some of the market's most trusted and recognized brand names for residential and commercial construction including GyprockTMplasterboard, BradfordTM Insulation, CemintelTM fibre cement, Hebel® autoclaved aerated concrete panels, PGHTM Bricks, MonierTM rooftiles, and AFS walling systemsTM.


Formed in 1855, CSR is one of Australia’s oldest companies and today has revenues over $2.2 billion and is part of the ASX200with over 2,800 employees across Australia and New Zealand.


CSRs product portfolio is currently grouped under three main pillars, Interior Systems (IS), Masonry & Insulation (M&I) and Construction Systems (CS).


The project encompasses the rebuilding of four websites (CSR AU & NZ, PGH,Gyprock) based on provided designs and creating reusable templates and components derived from Figma design files. Content population for these websites is a key task. Leveraging existing integrations with CRM, PIM, SAP Commerce (Hybris), DAM, Power BI, and Google Analytics (GA4).


Bistec Global has been made the implementation partner for these websites. We wish the team all the very best in completing this project.  

New Accounting Client onboard

VRS Accounting


VRS Accounting, a distinguished Melbourne-based accounting practice, stands as a testament to entrepreneurial ambition. The proprietor of VRS Accounting, an existing client, embarked on a remarkable journey by establishing her own accounting practice in the vibrant city of Melbourne, Australia.


We are privileged to be the driving force behind her success, extending our support through our meticulously tailored Job-Based Model. This partnership reflects the unwavering commitment of our organization to assist and empower talented individuals in realizing their business aspirations.


Company Updates

TGIF Evening- Melbourn, Australia

Bistec Global Services had a TGIF networking event in Melbourne Australia last Friday, 6th of October at “The Wharf Hotel, Melbourne.”

A warm thank you to everyone who joined us and made this event truly extraordinary!  

Taste of Lanka: Networking with a Sri Lankan Twist

The Company hosted the very first networking event on the 19th of September at Little Lanka Restuarant in Stockport, United Kingdom.


It was a fantastic evening filled with vibrant conversations, delicious Sri Lankan cuisine, and the opportunity to forge new connections.
A huge thank you to everyone who joined us in this pioneering event, and here's to the start of many more fruitful gatherings.


Sales and Marketing workshop

A sales and marketing workshop was held on the 10th of October 2023.

Mr. Manik Senanayake, founder of Life works and Choice Presented a workshop regarding tech selling which was fun, interesting and educational for all who attended.

Project Team Updates

BDO Global

About BDO


BDO (an acronym for BinderDijker Otte) is an international network of public accounting, tax, consulting, and business advisory firms that provide professional services under the name BDO. It is the fifth largest accounting network in the world. Global fee income of the member firms in the network for the year ended 30 September 2021, including the members of their exclusive alliances, totaled US$12.8 billion. Each BDO member firm is an independent legal entity in its own country.


About the Project


(BDO -GRP) The Global Reporting Platform is intended to enable the BDO to provide a number of analytics and advanced analytics capabilities sand services to internal stakeholders.


The scope focuses on establishing the Global Reporting Platform blueprint by following a multi-phase program of work, utilizing an iterative development approach to deliver proof of value to BDO stakeholders at each stage of the implementation.

Specifically, here are the key components of BDO -GRP:

  • Multiple input SQL DBs: multiple sources are expected and handled.

  • Azure Databricks: to build and run all data logic. The ingestion Databricks holds the ETL logic for extraction of the SQL databases of the member firms. The same Databricks workspace is used for the transformation of the data to the next data layers. A separate Databricks workspace is deployed for analytics use cases and exploration.

  • Azure Data Factory: orchestration of all processes.  

  • Definition of multiple Data Products: leveraging tools able to virtualize data access, it is expected to produce multiple Data Products connected to specific Containers.

  • Leveraging of Power BI Premium: because of its advanced capability, Power BI Premium is suggested to be a key component of the architecture.


Overall, GRP design supports the extraction of a complete copy of the member firm data in batch that can then be processed/transformed to produce the versioned common data model Product that can be then:


  • Provided to the larger and more mature member firms the data in an Azure data share so that they can build their automation and analytics autonomously.

  • Provide to all member firms generic BDO Global IT Power Bi reports and dashboards making analytics information to each member firm with no effort required on their side.    


Testing end-to-end data flow and processing through the ETL from Source to Target using Data Quality and data transformation testing is in scope for the Quality assurance perspective for BDO GRP project.


https://www.bdo.global/en-gb/home


During the month of October, the first phase of this platform was developed, demonstrated successfully and a live version has been published for Client feedback.

BDO Service Bot

BDO Service BOT, an innovative application designed to revolutionize how organizations address technical issues. The BDO Service BOT is a cutting-edge solution that streamlines the process of connecting with virtual agents to resolve technical challenges. The key features are Seamless Connection, Smart Agent Selection, Automated Communication and Escalation Capabilities. We're proud to announce that we have successfully conducted a client demonstration for our esteemed BDO clients. In addition, to our client demonstrations, our dedicated team has delved into several comprehensive research efforts. BDO service BOT leverages tools & technologies including Visual Studio 2022, Bot Frameworkv4, Microsoft Graph API, Azure Bot Service, and Microsoft Azure to create a powerful and innovative Service BOT solution.

Team members: Chandima, Lanka, Chamal, Supun, Vinudi, Hansini, Chamini


BDO Billing Utility

BDO Billing Utility is an application that simplifies the management and approval of user counts for each month for our valued BDO client. This application provides the breakdown of the user count for the firms which needs to be approved by the customer for each month. The BDO service desk requires this breakdown of user count for monthly billing. This is developed using the cutting-edge Power Apps platform. The key features are Streamlined Data Entry, Monthly User Count Management, Pending Request Management and Streamlined Approval/Rejection Process. We are excited to announce that the first version of the application is now ready to be released for the October billing cycle.


MJB Virtual Cabinet Files Migration to SharePoint

MJB Avanti is a firm which provides accounting services and business advice based in UK operating since 1876.


The project objective was to migrate operation files spanning over 7 years from the "Virtual cabinet" which is a tool used for the file repository into SharePoint which will save the company money and time.


The team were able to migrate a total of 188,740 files which were categorized into18 sections to the SharePoint within 3 weeks, in a brief period of time well before indented deadlines. Furthermore, we've implemented a new folder structure to locate these on SharePoint.


MJB Avanti was delighted by the quick yet high quality outcome and the efforts of the Bistec team.


Team members: Lakshan Malinga, Hansini, Shehan


Bistec Care Inventory Management system

We are thrilled to introduce the latest addition to the Bistec Care system: Bistec Care Inventory Management! This innovative module is designed to empower medical clinics by streamlining their inventory management processes. With features like receiving stock and issuing stock, it simplifies the often-intricate task of tracking medical supplies, ensuring that clinics can maintain optimal stock levels while minimizing waste and costs. Bistec Care Inventory Management promises to enhance efficiency, reduce administrative burdens, and ultimately contribute to the seamless operation of medical facilities. We are committed to continually evolving our system to meet the evolving needs of healthcare providers, and this new addition is a testament to our dedication to their success. We look forward to helping clinics make the most of this powerful tool for better patient care.


Bistec Care Kurunegala Field Visit

The team had our first ever field campaign around clinics in Kurunegala to promote BISTEC Care between the 12th and the 14th of October. Ranging from Ayurvedic clinics to one of the largest dental surgery practices in the area, the team had managed to successfully complete a total of 22 demonstrations.



Newly Onboarded Clinics:

  • Family dental care - Kurunegala (Dr. Yasith Kananke)

  • Diamond medical center - Batticaloa (Dr. MHM Azwar)

  • The Island medical clinic - Kiribathgoda (Dr. Pathum Kerner)

  • Allergy, Immunology and Cell Biology Unit (AICBU) - University of Sri Jayawardanapura


Queue Management - A requirement by the Nuwara Eliya district general hospital was released to production.



ARS Project Finalization and Team Lunch Outing

ARS project was successfully completed by the team with exceptional client delivery. Team went on a lunch out to celebrate the success.

NIS Solutions

Bistec Global is undertaking a multi phased Business Consulting engagement that will assist NIS Solutions in defining future activities and provide input in ensuring the business foundations, support mechanisms and strategic and operational roadmap are developed as displayed in the figure below.

New Joinees Onboarded


Tharindu Senanayake

Consultant Network Engineer





Kohilan Selvaratnam

Senior Sales Executive




Rizana Carder

People and Culture Executive





Hiruni Hansani

Senior Finance Executive



Shivahini Srithasan

Graphic Designer




Dinushi Tharika

Accounts Executive



Lahiru Jeewantha

Intern - Software



Jayath De Silva

Intern - Software



Rochelle Balakrishnan

Management Accountant

Hearts Academy Events

Toastmasters

In October 2023, our Toastmasters club held two meetings: a physical gathering on October 6th and an online session on October 20th. Our program, open to all Bistec employees, continues to provide opportunities for personal and professional growth through public speaking and leadership development. We anticipate more enriching meetings and progress in the months ahead.

Agile Quiz Competition- 2023

An internal Kahootquiz was conducted on 27th October2023 with the intention of increasing the companywide awareness and practice related to agile software development. This quiz consisted of 25 questions covering few major areas related to Agile practice. Congratulations to all the winners and we thank all 37 participants who took part in this quiz.


Accounting Training


Registrations for our upcoming 6-week training program on Australian bookkeeping practices are now closed. To ensure a high-quality learning experience, we limit each batch to just 10 members. This program offers participants a unique opportunity to gain expertise in Australian bookkeeping standards and practices.


With a registration fee of Rs. 5000, individuals can access comprehensive training and resources, equipping them with valuable skills for the world of finance. Stay tuned for future opportunities to join our exclusive training batches.


Industry Visit

We're delighted to support 35 University of Moratuwa students in their final projects with the help of 7 dedicated BISTEC mentors. On October 24, 2023, we organized an industrial visit, including an office tour to introduce our culture and individual mentorship sessions, kick-starting their projects. We eagerly anticipate their progress and success in this collaborative venture.


Hearts Talks

We sincerely thank Jeewantha, Dinusha, Viraj and Shampavi for conducting 4 awesome heart talks. Their expertise and engaging presentations were greatly appreciated. We are grateful for their contributions to our company and look forward to more inspiring talks in the future.

Individual Achievements


Pasan Gunathilake


BEng (Hons) in Software Engineering (TOP UP)



Nuskiya Nawroos


BBA Honours in Accounting



Lakshan Fernando


PMI-ACP certification


Nethmi Maneesha


BSc (Hons) Business with International Management



Sachini Alwis


Bachelor of Arts Honours in Business Management with Professional Experience


Sameera Saboordeen


Higher National Diploma


NEW R&D INITIATIVES


Word-Polish


Word-Polish is a new RnD initiative currently working on by BTO Team and Open-Source Community. This is an add-in application to Microsoft Word which helps users to enhance the document content quality based on the user's profession. Word-Polish has been developed utilizing the OpenAI API's features to generate custom content.


GitHub Project: bistecglobal/word-polish: MSword add-in with open ai (github.com)


CV Analyzer


This is a Python based platform developed by BTO Team and Open-Source Community to forecast the resume of an applicant whether it matches the job requirement. User has to provide below details which includes the job requirements.

  • Job Title

  • Experience Level

  • Communication Level

  • Company Culture


Thereby the platform generates a Job Description as well based on the above criteria provided. Then the platform utilizes OpenAI API and Lang Chain framework for the textual analysis to generate the forecasting of the provided resume whether it matches the generated job description.


GitHub Project: GitHub -bistecglobal/cv-analyzer-base


Hello Embed Chain


This is a standalone python based chatbot.


GitHub Project: GitHub -bistecglobal/hello-embedchain: https://bistec-chat.streamlit.app/


Adventure day out - Bistec Club


The BISTEC club for the previous term culminated its activities with a memorable outing to Che Adventure Park on September 6, 2023. Hearts enjoyed an exhilarating day of paintball, zip lining, and canoeing, followed by a delectable lunch. This event was made possible by the diligent efforts of our dedicated club members, who consistently organized fantastic activities throughout the year. As the sun sets on this chapter, we extend our best wishes to the incoming BISTEC club, hoping they achieve great success in all their endeavors.

Copyright (C) 2023 BISTEC GLOBAL. All rights reserved.

value.subject: RE: Call of Duty 4 MW Champions League 2023!
value.bodyPreview:
Hey there, Gaming Enthusiasts! 🎮🌟

The time has come to unleash your inner warriors and gear up for the thrilling Online Gaming extravaganza you've all been waiting for! 🏆🔥

📅 Save the dates for the upcoming battles:

🔫 TDM (Team Deathmatch)-

body.content:
Hey there, Gaming Enthusiasts! 🎮🌟

 

The time has come to unleash your inner warriors and gear up for the thrilling Online Gaming extravaganza you've all been waiting for! 🏆🔥

 

📅 Save the dates for the upcoming battles:

 

🔫 TDM (Team Deathmatch)- 17th November.

S&D (Search and Destroy)- 22nd November.

🏁 The Grand Finals - Where legends are born on the 1st of December.

 

Now, let's talk about the current scores of our fierce houses, Targaryen’s, Starks, and Lannister’s. 🏰💪

 

 

 

 

The Targaryen’s are riding high on the leaderboard with an impressive 177.5 points. They've taken the lead and are soaring like dragons through the realms of victory. Will any house dare to challenge their reign? 🏰👑

 

The competition is fierce, and every point counts! Remember, for each brave soul who participates in any game mode, your house will earn an additional 1 point, so make sure your teams are locked and loaded, ready to dominate the battlefield! 🏅💥

 

The server is now open at 5.00 pm to kick off this thrilling gaming season. Winter is coming, and it's time for your house to rise to glory!

 

Best Regards,

BISTEC Club 🏆🎮

 

 

From: The Bistec Club <club@bistecglobal.com>
Sent: Monday, November 6, 2023 1:32 PM
To: #All Hearts | BISTEC Global <AllHearts@bistecglobal.com>
Subject: RE: Call of Duty 4 MW Champions League 2023!

 

Greetings, Champions! 🏆🎮

We hope you're all locked and loaded, prepping your troops for the epic showdown that awaits!

It's time to roll up your sleeves, clear your battle stations, and get amped for the highly anticipated Online Gaming extravaganza we've all been yearning for.

Here's the lowdown: Every house must assemble three mighty teams.

🔵 Mix Team: 5 Girls and 5 Boys 

🚹 Boys Only Team: 10 players 

🚺 Girls Only Team: 10 players

We're talking two electrifying game modes, and each team will go head-to-head with the other houses, vying for their spot in the grand finale. Points will be your ticket to glory, and you can take the plunge into as many events as your heart desires. Feel like mixing things up within your house? Go for it! 🏅🏅🏅

Pro-tip: You can grab the game via the download link in the attached PDF (With the Guide) . Let's gear up! 📥🎮

Link to PDF-  COD4 Readme.pdf


But that's not all! Let's talk points: • In the final showdown:

🥇 Winners - 10 points 
🥈 2nd place - 6 points 
🥉 3rd place - 3 points 
🔫 Best Shooter (Male) - 2 points 
🔫 Best Shooter (Female) - 2 points

✨ For each brave soul who participates in any game mode- Earn 1 point for your house.

ITS TIME WARRIORS!!! assemble your teams, practice your moves, and get ready because WINTER is coming! 🎮💫

SERVER IS NOW OPEN!!! (Opening time- 5.00pm)

Best Regards

BISTEC Club

 

From: The Bistec Club <club@bistecglobal.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 2, 2023 5:12 PM
To: #All Hearts | BISTEC Global <AllHearts@bistecglobal.com>
Subject: RE: Call of Duty 4 MW Champions League 2023!

 

Hello warriors, ⚔

The battleground is set, and the call to arms has been sounded! We are thrilled to announce the “Call of Duty 4 MW Champions League”, a thrilling gaming experience that will test your mettle and courage on the virtual battlefield. It's time to rally your troops and prepare for an epic showdown! 🎮🏆

Before the battle commences, we want to make sure that everyone is on the same page, so let's go over the rules:

Rules of Engagement:

  1. No Nicknames Allowed: Each participant must use their real name followed by their house name. For example, "Lakshan_Stark."
  2. Team Size: Each team must consist of 10 players for each event. (Male, Female and Mix)
  3. Team Count Requirement: Each house will gain 2 points for one participant.
  4. Player Substitutions: Houses have the flexibility to swap and replace team members within their own house.
  5. Multiple Teams: Houses can form multiple teams for different game modes. This increases your house's chances of earning participation points. For example, you can have 2 teams of 10 boys each, playing different game modes, and your house will earn 20 participation points. Alternatively, if 15 boys participate in each mode with 10 members per mode, you'll earn 15 participation points.

Now, it's time to prepare your teams for the battle that lies ahead. Rally your comrades, strategize your moves, and let the gaming arena echo with your battle cries!

The Champions League is fast approaching, and the excitement is building. Let's make this the most unforgettable gaming experience of the year!

Remember, the glory of victory awaits the mightiest. Are you up for the challenge, soldier? Suit up, lock and load, and prepare for an epic showdown!

House Targs, Lannister’s, and Starks it is time to prepare your Teams and get ready for the battle. The Link for the game will be shared soon! 💪❤

Stay tuned for more updates, and let the games begin! ✨

Thank You!

BISTE Club

From: The Bistec Club <club@bistecglobal.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2023 4:03 PM
To: #All Hearts | BISTEC Global <AllHearts@bistecglobal.com>
Subject: Call of Duty 4 MW Champions League 2023!

 

Hello Warriors, ❤

Prepare for battle, soldier! The gaming arena is set, the guns are loaded, and victory awaits the mightiest. 🔫😃

We're excited to bring you the most electrifying gaming experience of the year - introducing the Call of Duty 4 MW Champions League!

IT IS TIME TO BRING BACK THE WAR BETWEEN THE HOUSES!!! ⚠

🔥 Are you ready to step into the boots of a true champion and conquer the battlefield? The time to prove your mettle has arrived!

Mark your calendars and rally your team!. Stay tuned for more details and get ready to ANSWER THE CALL OF DUTY. 🎮😉

Are you up for the challenge, soldier? Suit up, lock and load, and prepare for glory!

Stay tuned for more updates. Let the games begin!

Best regards,

BISTEC Club
